rooms.description: Spacious entrance with accessible ramp for wheelchair users. Features a reception area.
Open concept living room with floor-to-ceiling windows and seamless connectivity to the home theater. Includes built-in soundproofing for cinema experience.
Dedicated entertainment zone with retractable seating and integrated projection system. Acoustically optimized space.
Modern kitchen designed for ease of use including wheelchair-accessible countertops and appliances. Incorporates Vastu principles by positioning in the east or south-east corner.
Primary bedroom with a spacious balcony attached, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and ventilation. Includes accessible design elements such as wider doorways and grab bars.
Bathroom adjacent to bedroom1 with accessible fixtures and Vastu aligned placement.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window that provides ample natural light and aligns with Chettinad architectural style.
Spacious balcony door for accessibility and ventilation.
